definition.text: Path parameter is the type of parameters that is embedded as part of an URL path. It could be fixed string of text or it could be a parameter that is replaced by the API Fetcher Bot for some value at runtime.

paragraphs.text: codeName: here you must write the exact string that is going to be used to form the URL path.
replaceBy: this property allows you to instruct the API Fetcher Bot to set a value to this parameter replacing the current default and using contextual information available only at runtime.
Superalgos->Concept->replaceBy Config Property->How To Use It
